DOC.brief_summary: This Phase III clinical trial will examine the efficacy, safety, and tolerability of the addition of MK-0431/ONO-5435 to Japanese patients with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus who have inadequate glycemic control on diet/exercise therapy and insulin monotherapy.
DOC.brief_title: MK-0431/ONO-5435 Phase III Clinical Trial - Insulin Add-on Study for Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Japanese Patients with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus who have inadequate glycemic control on diet/exercise therapy and insulin monotherapy Patients with Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus
